/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are trees and shrubs, their green leaves contrasting with the blue of the sky. The road itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels along the way. A few cars can be seen in the distance, adding a touch of life to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees creating a striking contrast.
